item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Marcelo. I currently work as a Design Engineer at a small company that does a lot of electronics. For privacy reasons, I’m not gonna elaborate too much. I studied Mechanical Engineering and Computer Science at the Colorado School of Mines in Golden, CO. The reason I decided to double major was because I figured that having the knowledge of computers will be imperative in any industry. I see many universities requiring their STEM non-CS students be proficient in programming.
